panels.description: Time spent by database sessions in this database
panels.title: Session Time

panels.description: Time spent executing SQL statements in this database
panels.title: Active Time

panels.description: Time spent idling while in a transaction in this database
panels.title: Idle in Xact Time

panels.description: Time spent by database sessions in this database
panels.title: Session Time (avg by backend)

panels.title: Active Time  (avg by backend)

panels.description: Time spent idling while in a transaction in this database
panels.title: Idle in Xact Time  (avg by backend)

panels.description: Time spent executing SQL statements in this database
panels.title: Active Ratio (of CPU Time)

panels.description: Time spent executing SQL statements in this database
panels.title: Active Ratio (of Session Time)

panels.description: Time spent executing SQL statements in this database
panels.title: Idle in Xact Ratio (of Session Time)

targets.expr: sum by (datname) (pgbouncer_database_current_connections{ins="$ins", datname!="pgbouncer"}) / sum by (datname) (pgbouncer_database_max_connections{ins="$ins", datname!="pgbouncer"})

list.description: IP address of this postgres instance
list.label: IP
list.name: ip

list.description: Sequence number of this instance, which is an unique integer among a postgres cluster
list.label: Sequence
list.name: seq

list.description: Cluster identifier for this postgres instance, cls should be unique among entire environment. such as pg-meta, pg-test
list.label: Cluster
list.name: cls

list.description: Node name of current postgres instance
list.label: Node
list.name: node
